MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 19-OCT-2020 20:16.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the KY5 postcode area of Lochgelly. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:00pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Moffat Crescent substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:04pm on Monday, 19 October 2020
